events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position. The resume and cover letter have been uploaded to the system.
The application has been categorized under Engineering after identifying keywords related to software development and devops experience.
A recruiter with expertise in engineering hires has been assigned to coordinate the next steps with the candidate.
The initial phone screening was conducted and the candidate showed strong understanding of software development principles and relevant technologies.
Candidate has responded promptly confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the role.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th, with the engineering panel to assess coding skills and system design knowledge.
